name: credicor
effect: (Effect: After you pay for a card or standard project with a basic cost of 20 megacredit or more, you gain 4 megacredit.)

name: ecoline
effect: (Effect: You may always pay 7 plants, instead of 8, to place greenery.)
start: (You start with 2 plantprod, 3 plants, and 36 megacredit)

name: Helion
effect: (Effect: Your may use heat as megacredit. You may not use megacredit as heat.)

name: Mining Guild
effect: (Effect: Each time you get any steel or titanium as a placement bonus on the map, increase your steelprod 1 step.)
start: (You start with 30 megacredit, 5 steel, and 1 steelprod)

name: INTERPLANETARY CINEMATICS
effect: (Effect: Each time you play an event, you gain 2 megacredit.)

name: Inventrix
effect: (Effect: Your temperature, oxygen and ocean requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.)
start: (As you first action in the game, draw 3 cards. Start with 45 megacredit.)

name: Phoblog
effect: (Effect: Your titanium resources are each worth 1 megacredit extra.)

name: Tharsis Republic
effect: (Effect: When any city tile is placed ON MARS, increase your megacreditprod 1 step. When you place a city tile, gain 3 megacredit.)
start: (You start with 40 megacredit. As your first action in the game, place a city tile.)

name: Thorgate
effect: (Effect: When playing a power card OR THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, you pay 3 megacredit less for it.)

name: UNITED NATIONS MARS INITIATIVE
effect: (Action:If your tr was raised this generation, you may pay 3 megacredit to raise tr 1 step more.)
